label: Primary Muscles
short_description: High-level anatomical sections used for broad workout categorization (e.g., Chest, Legs).

label: Secondary Muscles
short_description: Intermediate level focused on individual muscle groups for targeted training (e.g., Quads, Biceps).

label: Tertiary Muscles
short_description: The most granular level, identifying specific muscle heads and distinct fibers (e.g., Long Head, VMO).
